ValidationRule.description: Alerts a user to the necessity of a time zone needed if an event is scheduled or later in its work process.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ((ISPICKVAL(Status__c ,"Scheduled") || ISPICKVAL(Status__c ,"Venue Set") || ISPICKVAL(Status__c ,"Program Set") || ISPICKVAL(Status__c ,"In-Production") || ISPICKVAL(Status__c ,"Completed")) && (Event_End_Date__c > TODAY()) && ( ISPICKVAL(Time_Zone__c,"")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a time zone for the physical location of where the event will be executed.
